title: Collaborative Project-Based Educational Reform Design for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational concepts and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Process where pre-/in-service teachers design and implement professional development strategies applicable in real educational settings through project activities

learning_goals: Participants can analyze the core principles of educational reform (collaborative teacher culture, professional autonomy, innovation-promoting policies) and propose three or more practical implementation plans
Participants can design a Teacher Learning Community (TLC) operation manual using PBL approaches and refine it by incorporating peer feedback
Participants can develop and validate the applicability of one or more assessment systems that support teacher professional development using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
